items.name: Multiattack
entries: Thwad makes three attacks with his maul or his shortbow.

items.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage if Thwad has more than half of his total hit points remaining.
